skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a lightning bolt. But not visibly, that would be too flashy.

skills.name: Fireball Bolt
skills.description: Shoots a Fireball bolt, which isn't really a thing, but just pretend, OK?

skills.name: Overly Close-Range Invisible Laser Attack
skills.description: Overly Close-Range Invisible Laser Attack, what does it sound like?

skills.name: Super Fist Punch
skills.description: Balls a wing up into a feathery fist and wallops you in the face

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Lightly pecks you in the face

skills.name: Blob
skills.description: Lightly blobs you in the face
